docs.snippet: The Caribbean received a record number of visitors last year as arrivals topped 29 million, tourism officials announced Thursday, and they said growth should continue this year, though at a slightly slower pace due to uncertainty over U.S. Preside...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Caribbean received a record number of visitors last year as arrivals topped 29 million, tourism officials announced Thursday, and they said growth should continue this year, though at a slightly slower pace due to uncertainty over U.S. President Donald Trump and the impact of Britain's move to leave the European Union.

docs.snippet: Italy's antitrust authority opened an investigation into a broadband joint venture between Telecom Italia and Swisscom unit Fastweb for possible violations of competition rules, it said in a statement on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy's antitrust authority opened an investigation into a broadband joint venture between Telecom Italia and Swisscom unit Fastweb for possible violations of competition rules, it said in a statement on Thursday.

headline.main: Italy Opens Probe Into Telecom Italia-Fastweb Broadband Deal
headline.print_headline: Italy Opens Probe Into Telecom Italia-Fastweb Broadband Deal

docs.snippet: A report released Thursday estimates more than 2.5 million immigrants in the country illegally live in the metropolitan areas of New York, Los Angeles and Chicago, which have pledged to fight President Trump's plans to expand deportations....

headline.print_headline: Nearly 1 in 5 Immigrants in US Illegally in NYC, LA Areas

docs.snippet: Although judges shot down Anthem Inc's $54 billion (£43.1 billion) acquisition of Cigna Corp and Aetna Inc's $35 billion takeover of Humana Inc on anti-trust grounds, the rulings left scope for a possible combination of Cigna and Humana, indu...
docs.lead_paragraph: Although judges shot down Anthem Inc's $54 billion (£43.1 billion) acquisition of Cigna Corp and Aetna Inc's $35 billion takeover of Humana Inc on anti-trust grounds, the rulings left scope for a possible combination of Cigna and Humana, industry insiders said.

headline.main: Cigna, Humana Could Still Combine Despite Anti-Trust Rulings-Analysts
headline.print_headline: Cigna, Humana Could Still Combine Despite Anti-Trust Rulings-Analysts
